reviews.name: Marley & Me: Bad Dog Edition (2-Disc) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I saw this in the movies and couldnt wait to get it on DVD when I heard it was going out. Its a great movie about a couple who start their live together and the crazy antantics of their dog along the way. Its a funny yet heartwarming movie. If you are a dog lover you will love this movie.
reviews.title: Great Movie

reviews.name: Marley & Me: Bad Dog Edition (2-Disc) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic DVD. Very moving. Glad I waited and purchased it as a BluRay Dics.
reviews.title: BluRay Disc

reviews.name: Marley & Me: Bad Dog Edition (2-Disc) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This was such a cute movie. Marley was definitely the star!! If you are a big dog lover or just a softy at heart you better have some tissue handy. Wish they would make more movies like this one. The entire family can really enjoy watching it together. I know my almost 10 year old grandson is going to like it. Can't wait to get it so we can sit & watch it together.
reviews.title: Cute Movie

reviews.name: Marley & Me: Bad Dog Edition (2-Disc) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Movie hoes with the popcorn and popcorn machine got the entire family
reviews.title: Cute movie for kids
